name: Camp Counselors
description:
Camp Counselors

The Terror Is Real

One-shot adventure from Inkborn.Studo!

You are a Camp Counselor just trying to make it to the end of camp when one camper goes missing...The running joke is that if the camp doesn’t burn down and no one dies, camp is generally considered  a success.  However, rumor has it that camp hasn’t always been a success...And now, one camper has gone missing.  Can you find them before camp ends?

What kind of camp is it?

Who went missing?

What dangers lurk in the dark?

You and your fellow players decide!  

  • Camp Counselors is a tabletop role-playing game where the Game Master guides the Players through a collaborative storytelling adventure where a roll of the dice could change your fate.
  • Camp Counselors is designed for two to six players and a Game Master.
  • Players will need one 10-sided dice and one percentage dice to play.
